channel.title: I hate Christmas
channel.description:
Today I went to town to get some groceries for Christmas, thought I would be better off I got mine early. So I stop by the atm machine, and withdraw 250€. I stick the money in my wallet, and put it in my pocket.
First I stop at the pet shop, got some dogfood... Tabac shop was next... When I walked out of the tabac shop, I saw a guy slip away... So of course I helped the guy getting up.. He said thanks and ran away.
When I finished doing my groceries I noticed something was missing.... I was hoping that it was my tabac, but instead my wallet was gone...

Yea, ever since i got stung by a jellyfish i dont go in the ocean or eat peanut butter and jelly.

item.title: I hate Christmas
item.dc:creator: @T3arful T3arful
item.description:
@T3arful wrote:

casey.:

so this makes you hate Christmas why?

An event that happens around a certain time period can change your views on any certain events around that time period.
Eg; When I was hit with a fire work, scared the shit out me. I dislike bonfire night now.

Read full topic

Today I went to town to get some groceries for Christmas, thought I would be better off I got mine early.
